Name: Block Statue of Sobek-nakht
Description: This diorite block statue shows Sobek-nakht, a governor from the 19th Dynasty, with his hands crossed on his knees. He has a small beard and is wearing a tight garment that leaves his hands and feet visible. His ears are partially visible under the curly locks of hair that cover his head.Sobek-nakht holds a piece of cloth in his right hand. A hieroglyphic text is engraved on the statue, the back of which is supported by a small pillar.
